#summary Vertex defs

= Introduction =

In the .m3 files, the vertex data seems to be contained within a uint8 block.


= Details =

{{{

struct Vertex
{
    Vec3D pos;
    char boneWeight[4];
    char boneIndex[4];
    char normal[4];  //normal_x = (float)normal[0]/255.0f...
    uint16 uv[2];
    uint32 d1;
    uint32 d2;
};

}}}

Source: http://madx.dk/wowdev/wiki/index.php?title=M3
